snippet.title: Backbeat Steam Next Fest Sing-Along Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam to get updates on livestreams and contests: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1585730/Backbeat/?utm_source=YT&utm_medium=TR&utm_campaign=WL

Award-winning indie developer Ichigoichie is bringing a brand new demo of Backbeat to the Steam Next Fest!

Follow Ichigoichie / 151A on Social Media: 
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/ichigoichie_inc
► Facebook: https://facebook.com/ichigoichiegames/
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ichigoichiegames/


Visit the 1990s inspired website for Backbeat:
https://backbeatgame.com/

About Backbeat

Backbeat is a multilinear time-based puzzle/strategy hybrid, set in 1995 suburban America. This creative title from the makers of award-winning Hexagroove: Tactical DJ plans to release in early 2022.

The story of Backbeat follows Watts, an aspiring bassist captivated by the magic of funk music as she recruits a group of hometown amateurs to form the band “Powerslyde” and take on the art school darlings “La Tormenta” in the Battle of the Bands. Guide Watts and her friends on a musical journey rooted in funk and fusion. Manipulate threads of time in a turn-based, rewindable system to make your way past surly shift managers, suspicious security guards, and sticky-fingered children through 40 levels of strategic puzzling madness. Follow real life jam band rules and perform tricks to maximize your score. Customize your performance with audio effect pedals, playing styles, and instrument swaps, then share your creative puzzle solution captures directly from the game.
